Test Name: Inherited Rhabdomyolysis and Metabolic Myopathy Panel
Purpose: To detect genetic mutations linked to inherited rhabdomyolysis and metabolic myopathies for accurate diagnosis and patient management.
Container: EDTA tube for blood or sterile container/cryovial for muscle biopsy
Equipment: PCR thermal cycler, next-generation sequencer, spectrophotometer, gel electrophoresis system, UV transilluminator
